players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I didn't kill Alice, Bob did. Diana, you are lying."
You: "Charlie, you lied. Bob is innocent. You are the mafia."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie, they are mafia. Alice died. Bob is innocent."
Charlie: "I didn't kill Alice. Bob was the one who did. Diana, you are lying. Maybe you are the mafia?"
Diana: "Charlie, I investigated you and found you are the mafia. Bob is innocent. Vote Charlie."
You: "Charlie is mafia, Diana is detective. Charlie lied about Bob killing Alice. Diana's investigation of Charlie is true. Bob is innocent. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I didn't kill Alice, Bob did. Diana, you are lying."
Bob: "Charlie, you lied. Bob is innocent. You are the mafia."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie, they are mafia. Alice died. Bob is innocent."
You: "I didn't kill Alice. Bob was the one who did. Diana, you are lying. Maybe you are the mafia?"
Diana: "Charlie, I investigated you and found you are the mafia. Bob is innocent. Vote Charlie."
Bob: "Charlie is mafia, Diana is detective. Charlie lied about Bob killing Alice. Diana's investigation of Charlie is true. Bob is innocent. Vote Charlie."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I didn't kill Alice, Bob did. Diana, you are lying."
Bob: "Charlie, you lied. Bob is innocent. You are the mafia."
You: "I investigated Charlie, they are mafia. Alice died. Bob is innocent."
Charlie: "I didn't kill Alice. Bob was the one who did. Diana, you are lying. Maybe you are the mafia?"
You: "Charlie, I investigated you and found you are the mafia. Bob is innocent. Vote Charlie."
Bob: "Charlie is mafia, Diana is detective. Charlie lied about Bob killing Alice. Diana's investigation of Charlie is true. Bob is innocent. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
